# 题目

实现一个 `wrap_string` 函数，遍历给定字符串中的每个单词，如果当前行的长度超过了 `text_width::Int=10`，那么在末尾单词前插入换行符。提供给一个例子

```julia
function wrap_string(str, text_width = 10)
    result = ""
    for i in eachindex(str)
        if str[i] == ' ' && length(result) + 1 >= text_width
            # 在当前单词前插入换行符，并将单词添加到结果中
            result *= "\n"
            result *= str[i]
        else
            # 将字符添加到结果中
            result *= str[i]
        end
    end
    return result
end

# 示例
str = "Hello this is a very long string that needs to be wrapped to fit within the specified text width."
text_width = 10
print(wrap_string(str, text_width))
```

这个例子将输出：

```
Hello this
is a very
long string
that needs
to be wrapped
to fit within
the specified
text width.
```
